name: Regular
description: Standard seating with comfortable cushions and good viewing angles.

name: VIP
description: Premium seats with extra legroom, priority service and reclining options.

name: Couple
description: Two-person sofa seats for couples with shared armrest and more privacy.

name: Deluxe
description: High-end leather seating with tray tables and private lighting.

name: Balcony
description: Raised section seats providing the best overall theater view.
